mapper.insert: insert into ac_tenant (id, name, code, main_account, contact, mobile, phone, email, address, logo, type, status, note, creator, create_time) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{mainAccount}, #{contact}, #{mobile}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{logo}, #{type}, 0, #{note}, #{creator}, now())
mapper.update: update ac_tenant set status=#{status}, editor=#{editor}, edit_time=now() where id in #{id}
mapper.select: select id `key`, name value from ac_tenant order by CONVERT(name USING gbk)
